link_mentions.page: Raymond Paul
response: Paul was the son of a French fencing master, who settled in London. He was the brother of René Paul, ex-husband of June Foulds-Paul, uncle of Barry Paul and Graham Paul and father of Steven Paul.

link_mentions.page: Graham Paul
response: Graham René Paul (born 15 May 1947) is a retired British international fencer.
He is part of a famous fencing and athletics family; parents René Paul and June Foulds, brother Barry Paul, uncle Raymond Paul and cousin Steven Paul.

link_mentions.page: Barry Paul
response: He is part of a famous fencing and athletics family; his parents were René Paul and June Foulds, his brother is Graham Paul, his uncle was Raymond Paul and his cousin is Steven Paul.

link_mentions.page: Steven Paul (fencer)
response: Steven Paul's family heritage was as part of a famous fencing and athletics family, including father Raymond Paul, uncle René Paul, Mother June Paul (Foulds), cousins Graham Paul and Barry Paul, grandson of Leon Paul. In later life he became the Head Coach and Chairman of the Royal Tunbridge Wells Fencing Club.
